name: Plant Panic (Htastic)
description:
You woke up and for reasons unknown suddenly can't see anything! As you tumble around, you can't fail to notice you keep pumping into fruit. After throwing them in a certain direction you hear - what you can distinguish - happy chewing noises. Might as well keep going - what could possibly go wrong?

Your objective is to feed the plant and keep the bar at the top from running out. Feeding it the same color of fruit multiple times, will  result in bonuses applied to your character.

Controls:

E - Pick up / Throw fruit

Arrow Keys: Move left and Right

Credits (alphabetical order):

Made for the Bored Pixels Jam 2021 in only 7 days.
